title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 8
itunes:title: Good Morning Football Podcast Episode 8
description:
On this episode: Nate talks about becoming a guinea pig for Gatorade (1:38); The hosts recap Wild Card weekend story lines (4:39); They discuss Odell Beckham Jr.'s playoff legacy (6:55); For one game: Aaron Rodgers or Tom Brady? (13:02); Nate explains the Kobe Bryant effect (16:35); The team previews the Divisional Round starting with Packers at Cowboys (24:36); Nate talks about how important it is for players to avoid the news (31:53); Steelers at Chiefs (32:22) Texans at Patriots (36:19); Seahawks at Falcons (39:36); and Kyle wraps up the episode with what it is like to go to the Playboy Mansion (45:24).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
